attributes.action: Increase the legal age at which alcohol can be purchased or consumed in public to 21.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the increasing concerns over public behaviour by young people and the overwhelming evidence that alcohol is a major factor, the UK should bring it's policy in line with the US and increase the minimum age at which alcohol can be purchased or consumed in public places.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
